spec.kubeconfig:
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: {{env.cacert}}
    server: {{env.url_base}}
  name: kubernetes
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes
    user: apiuser
  name: apiuser@kubernetes
current-context: apiuser@kubernetes
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: apiuser
  user:
    token: {{env.token}}
